department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

goal.ch: The course introduces the physical origins of the three heat transfer mechanisms (heat conduction, convection and radiation) and develops fundamental concepts and mathematical expressions of them. The knowledge shall be applied to attacking heat transfer problems for the determination of temperature distributions and heat transfer rate and for the designing of heat exchangers, which are of great industrial value. The course materials will lay the foundation for the Process Design course in students' senior year.
goal.en: "The course introduces the physical origins of the three heat transfer mechanisms (heat conduction, convection and radiation) and develops fundamental concepts and mathematical expressions of them. The knowledge shall be applied to attacking heat transfer problems for the determination of temperature distributions and heat transfer rates and for the designing of heat exchangers, which are of great industrial value. The course materials will lay the foundation for the Process Design course in students' senior year."

outline.ch:
1. One- and two-dimensional, steady-state heat conduction
2. Transient heat conduction
3. Heat convection with internal or external flows
4. Free convection
5. Boiling and condensation
6. Heat exchangers
7. Heat radiation
outline.en:
1. One- and two-dimensional, steady-state heat conduction
2. Transient heat conduction
3. Heat convection with internal or external flows
4. Free convection
5. Boiling and condensation
6. Heat exchangers
7. Heat radiation

textbook.ch: Principles of Heat and Mass Transfer, 8th Edition by F. P. Incropera et. al., Wiley, ISBN 99781119409090
textbook.en: Principles of Heat and Mass Transfer, 8th Edition by F. P. Incropera et. al., Wiley, ISBN 99781119409090
